_source.text: 19. New Adventure Island (TG16) - The Wonderboy and Adventure Island games have seen quite a few releases on various consoles over the years, but none better than this outstanding TurboGrafx-16 rendition.

text: releases on various consoles over the years, but none **better** **than** this outstanding TurboGrafx-16 rendition.

_source.text: 3. Adventure walks! or Treasure Hunt! (sounds way better than 'get lost while I set up the tent').

text: 3. **Adventure** walks! or Treasure Hunt! (sounds way **better** **than** 'get lost while I set up the tent').

_source.text: 4. Islands of Adventure: When building this park next to its Florida 'studio' park, Universal did something very unusual: they made a second park that was BETTER than the original.

text: something very unusual: they made a second park that was **BETTER** **than** the original.
4. Islands of **Adventure**: When building this park next to its Florida 'studio' park, Universal did

_source.text: A first-person survival horror adventure with an amnesiac protagonist; the story is somewhat better than you'd think.

text: A first-person survival horror **adventure** with an amnesiac protagonist; the story is somewhat **better** **than** you'd think.

_source.text: Adventure Time is better in my opinion.
Adventure Eggs is decent, but pricewise and being able to get them easy OE is better even on that.

text: **Adventure** Eggs is decent, but pricewise and being able to get them easy OE **is** **better** even on that.

_source.text: Adventure is the name of the game here, and few do it better than Nadia.

text: **Adventure** is the name of the game here, and few do it **better** **than** Nadia.

_source.text: Adventure seekers are in luck: What could be better than a free ride on one of the most thrilling roller coasters in America?

text: **Adventure** seekers are in luck: What could be **better** **than** a free ride on one of the most thrilling roller coasters in America?

_source.text: After all when a person works forever on something it would be easy to have the ego feel threatened that its all a waste... but which is better, hiding from it or finding out if there is more of an adventure waiting?

text: that its all a waste... but which **is** **better**, hiding from it or finding out if there is more of an **adventure** waiting?

_source.text: After a day of family fun and adventure, there's nothing better than enjoying a delicious meal together as the sunsets - and the Catskills' restaurants offer something everyone can enjoy.

text: After a day of family fun and **adventure**, there's nothing **better** **than** enjoying a delicious meal
